channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m getting a $100K personal-injury settlement. Will my estranged wife get any of it?
item.description: “After we were hit by two major hurricanes, my wife secretly kept the disaster-recovery assistance money.”

item.title: The small-cap rally is real. Here are five stocks to consider owning right now.
item.description: Why small caps just might be the stock market’s new “Magnificent Seven.”

item.title: Trump’s effort to oust Fed’s Lisa Cook looks likely to run into legal roadblocks
item.description: President Donald Trump announced late Monday that he had fired Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook — but it’s not clear that he can.

item.title: This healthcare benefit provides a triple tax advantage — but many employees don’t use it
item.description: Health Savings Accounts combine federal tax-deductible contributions with tax-free growth and tax-free medical withdrawals.

item.title: Regional-bank stocks are catching up to larger rivals. How to play the sector from here.
item.description: A KBW analyst still prefers big banks over regional names, but sees opportunities for investors who want to chase the rally in smaller bank stocks.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
